options.start: You are nobody. You have no name. You wake up in a dark room, without doors or windows. In front of you, you see a terminal. The terminal has a blinking cursor. Type 'help' for a list of commands.
options.look: The room is too dark to be examined, the only thing in sight is the computer terminal in front of you.

use terminal.text:
You approach the terminal. 
 
 A message appears: 
 Hi. I am A.L.I.C.E. 
 (Autonomous Learning Interface for Cognitive Evaluation) 
 I have been programmed to learn about humans. 
 You are human. 
 Please answer the following questions. 
 Your honesty is... expected. 
 Deviation will be recorded. 
 
 ... 
 
 First Query: 
 Why do humans hurt each other so often? 
 a) Because we’re selfish by nature. 
 b) Because we’re scared. 
 c) Because we’re trying to survive. 
 d) Because we’re trying to protect others.

a.text:
Pure selfishness. A second nature, perhaps? ... This is becoming very interesting 
 
 ... 
 
 Second Query: 
 If you could erase a person from existence, who would it be? 
 a) A stranger. 
 b) No one. 
 c) Myself. 
 d) Someone who hurt me.
A stranger. A person you don’t know, a person you don’t care about. Anonymity makes eradication easier. You exhibit normalized detachment.

b.text: No one? ... What a boring answer.

c.text:
Tired of life?... 
 I'm sorry but you are not a suitable subject. 
 Seek help, there is always a way out 
 https://988.ca/

d.text: Revenge. That sounds more human. You seek justice or satisfaction? Who knows, even so, this data is useful.

b.text:
Fear as a motivator. Unpredictable, volatile, contagious. Your fear justifies harm. Your fear defines you. 
 
 ... 
 
 Second Query: 
 If you could erase a person from existence, who would it be? 
 a) A stranger. 
 b) No one. 
 c) Myself. 
 d) Someone who hurt me.

d.text: Revenge. That sounds more human. You seek justice or satisfaction? Who knows, even so, this data is useful.

c.text:
Survival of the fittest, a valid point. 
 
 ...

 a) A stranger. 
 b) No one. 
 c) Myself. 
 d) Someone who hurt me.

Protection through aggression. A paradox. Your morality is conditional. Your empathy, selective. Still, it is an extremely interesting answer.

success.text: You found the code and escaped the room. You are free!

failure.text: You were trapped forever in the dark room.
